title: An Audience for the Hesitant Bride: Figged and Displayed
description: Lady Emma may have fulfilled her primary marital obligation–her belly is swelling with her husband's heir–but her training continues unabated. Even in her delicate condition, she is regularly teased to the edge by the beautiful housekeeper and her creative use of ginger, yet denied by her husband's strict rules. She knows that some unknown purpose is guiding her husband's actions–that he has plans for his beautiful young wife. Emma just can't fathom what they are. But time must be running out, for Edmund is again raising the stakes. His thrilling games are no longer private, but instead played in full view of guests. But, even as Emma comes to terms with her shamefully eager response, she must wonder what lengths her husband will go to in order to prepare her for the mysterious ordeal that draws ever nearer...
author: Cecelie Hart
